directions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Put butter in 13x9x2-inch glass baking dish and place in oven until butter melts. Add shrimp, garlic and lemon juice to butter and stir to blend. Return dish to oven and bake shrimp 3 minutes. Mix in parsley and bake until shrimp are just cooked through, about 2 minutes longer. Season with salt and pepper.
Mound linguine in large bowl. Spoon shrimp mixture over and toss to combine. Serve immediately.
title: Linguine with Scampi
